data.text: @people Ough..YOU relapsed because of YOU and only YOU. You learned nothing in rehab apparently, and to involve your family and guilt shame them in the press. #rhony #RHONYC #RHONYreunion
@janeOprice @people #luannlies
@people She was partying well before the lawsuit
@people https://t.co/9fkNDJii6K
@CitizenBrown3 @AMushroomQueen @people Nope not at all the norm. As soon as my kids turned 18, I received a letter from the court stating that child support was ending.
@AHForte @AMushroomQueen @people I did have a great attorney and wealthy ex.  So that's probably not the norm.
@CitizenBrown3 @AMushroomQueen @people No. I'm talking about divorce. If you were able to negotiate child support through the age of 21, God bless. But child support ends at the age of 18.
@AHForte @AMushroomQueen @people I don't think we are talking about public assistance, which does end at 18. It may have been a while choir you,  but today out ends after college.
@CitizenBrown3 @AMushroomQueen @people Not true. My child support ended when they turned 18.

@AHForte @AMushroomQueen @people Child support is received until the kids have graduated college,  which they both are still in college.  What money she had,  she spent.  She used the children's money to purchase her new apartment, rather than selling her Hampton home to support her lifestyle.

@people Imagine how your children feel. BTW. We know the reason you went back to rehab... you were/are ashamed of the lawsuit brought against you by your children and didn’t want to address it at the reunion. Please note, we are not stupid.  #iseeyou

@CitizenBrown3 @AMushroomQueen @people Her "kids" are 23 and 20 Doubtful they were splitting time between mama et papa. Since they weren't minors, she would not have received child support. Luann also has her own money from the series and her modeling and acting career.
@people Cmon grow up. No ones fault but your own. Stop making excuses to justify your weakness
@people @bravoholclique If she should have just set up those trust funds like she was supposed to.

@AHForte @AMushroomQueen @people She made her bed... The kids went to live with dad because she was MIA or drunk.  There was nowhere for them at Toms one bedroom penthouse. She lost her spousal support and child support so she took the kids money.
@CitizenBrown3 @AMushroomQueen @people My point is they will be inheriting plenty from daddy. Not saying what she did was right however I do think it could have been settled out of court.
@people You spent their money...

@AHForte @AMushroomQueen @people That's daddies net worth,  not the kids.  Lu stole their inheritance.  No matter how she spins it.  She relapsed because she is an alcoholic and thinks rules don't apply to her. #RHONY
@saybetty9802 @people That's what I was thinking. A good friend would not suggest martinis.
@ekgoldberg @people Totally agree, and she left early for her caberet act. She can't sing. Her sobriety is more important.
@people We don't know all the facts about the issue.
@people I am sorry but if you consume that much alcohol when u relapse u need more then a month in re-hab. She needs a 3 month re-hab. This obession of being relevant is taking over life
@people @LoveAndyC Aaaaaaand this kind of language is why she will keep relapsing. She is accountable for her own actions.
@GoldenGirlOG @people @LoveAndyC Yes, bad character. Poor kids!!!

@people Luann- do you really think talking about “ grand piano’s and gates” is going to hide what is really happening?   Why didn’t you explain the trust funds- I’ll bet your children could care less about that home- they care about what you did with their trust funds-
@people they didnt make her relapse, Luann did, and only Luann
@people @bravoholclique She screwed her children outta money Meant for them that’s love ok never mind Count Dracula yr kids yr kids
@people @bravoholclique Luann is selfish AF. Girl get a grip.
@people You felt betrayed? You spent their money, millions of dollars ! You are a selfish woman that thought more of yourself than your children , shame on you!
@people She wasn’t devastated about her kids and ex suing her, she was devastated about losing the house she wanted LMAOO & can we talk about the endless plugs for her career? #REALITYGOLD
@people Well maybe you shouldn't have stole their money!
@AMushroomQueen @people I wonder though if they spoke to her. Legal action should be a last resort. And I wouldn't feel too sorry for her kids. Daddy's net worth is $50 million.

@people @LoveAndyC Betrayed??? Um,wrong use of words! She fell off the wagon because she betrayed her children and ex husband! I'm on team Dorinda here,shes a little loud this season but Lu needs to get it together...
@people Some friend

@people @LoveAndyC Relapsed after realizing how low you have to be to steal from your own children and leaving them with no recourse except to sue you.  No, she’s too self centered to face that reality
@people Stealing from your children’s trust funds is despicable behavior and she deserves to be sued.  Betrayed?  🤦🏻‍♀️
@people LUANN FELT BETRAYED when her kids sued her FOR STEALING THEIR INHERITANCE bye #RHONY
